title: Take That's Howard Donald and wife Katie Halil announce birth of second son Dougie Bear
text:
Take That's Howard Donald and wife Katie Halil announce birth of second son Dougie Bear The singer and his wife welcomed their baby boy into the world on Tuesday Share     
Take That's Howard Donal has announced the birth of his baby son, Dougie Bear Donald. 
The 48-year-old pop singer took to Twitter in the early hours of Wednesday to announce that he and his wife Katie Halil had welcomed their baby boy into the world hours earlier. 
The pop star shared the happy news with his fans on social media, while announcing the name of his second son with his wife of two years. Read More Take That star Howard Donald looks like he's been Up All Night as he takes baby son for a stroll Howard Donald (Photo: Andy Stenning) 
Writing to his 172,000 followers on Twitter, the Patience singer announced: "Hello Dougie Bear Donald! He's here and he's beautiful! He arrived yesterday morning and we are over the the Pluto. X" 
Dougie is Howard and Katie's second child, following the birth of eldest son Bowie in January 2016. 
The 13-month-old tot was named in honour of the late rock icon, David Bowie, who died earlier that month. Read More Take That star Howard Donald announces wife is expecting their second baby 
The pop star and his wife announced they were expecting their second child in October, with Howard taking to Twitter to make a tongue-in-cheek announcement. 
He tweeted: "Guess what? Me and katie are happy to announce we will have our 2nd child in Feb. Yay! No more sleep for another 2 years! [sic]." 
Howard also has two daughters from previous relationship: Grace, 18, and 12-year-old Lola. Read More Take That son! Howard Donald gives baby Bowie a big kiss as he shows plenty of Love Love Jason Orange The 57th Ivor Novello Awards held at the Grosvenor House - Arrivals London, England - 17.05.12 (Photo: WENN) 
Grace's mother is Victoria Piddington, while Marie-Christine Musswessels, who he split from in 2009, is the mother of his youngest daughter. 
Dougie's birth explain why Howard was a no-show at the premiere of Gala night of bandmate Gary Barlow's The Girls Musical, on Tuesday. 
The singer was forced to pull out of his appearance at the Phoenix Theatre in Londonâ€™s West End at the last minute - with it now becoming clear that Katie and he had just welcomed their little boy earlier on in the day.
